slide_content_0:
Aptoide is a marketplace for applications that can be downloaded and used on Android devices. Yes, when people think of an alternative to Google Play Store, they switch to Aptoide.

Aptoide was launched in the year of 2009 with the idea of users being able to manage their store instead of a unique or centralized store. This store is currently in its 8th version with the versions such as Aptoide for smartphones and tablets, Aptoide TV – an edition for smart TVs and STBs, Aptoide VR, and Aptoide Kids – developed for children’s devices. Aptoide is run by an android application that is used to access the stores. This is an open-source application where the communication between the client and servers is carried on with an open protocol based on XML.
slide_content_1:
All apps cannot be found in the Google Play store and, some apps might be available only in their premium versions. Although you would find those apps or the same premium apps for free across other stores. The same goes for apps that come with a lot of ads and you can get an ad-free version for free from a different store. 

On Aptoide, you would find apps uploaded by someone who already has bought the original app or accessed it from elsewhere but not the owner or the company themselves. Unlike Play Store, Aptoide is a free platform and hence, anyone can upload applications to the platform. Aptoide lets you download the apk of the app and install it for further use. 

Aptoide is user friendly and also lets users/developers monetize and promote their apps. No doubt you would find many apps on Aptoide and the maximum would be from non-genuine users, you can also check for genuine and malware-free apps (having a verified badge) to avoid any kind of trouble.
slide_content_2:
Launching the Aptoide Store application (for the first time) will show a short tutorial to you and then some disclaimers. After passing through them, Aptoide's home page will appear (see the screenshot below).

The toolbar is located at the bottom of the screen. With the "Home" button near the bottom left corner, one can return to the initial (home) view of this app.

 The home view presents some popular applications.  You can get to the actual list of apps divided into a number of categories by tapping the APPS button near the top right corner and by scrolling the display. If you tap "MORE" instead of scrolling, a list of top apps will be shown to you.

The "Apps" button at the right end of the toolbar has the apps that you have installed on your phone (once you have done that). It will also indicate for which of those apps there are updates.
slide_content_3:
Search for your favourite app by tapping "Search" at the toolbar and by typing a keyword for the search.

Tap the app you want to install (see also chapter 2.2.).
slide_content_4:
Tapping on a search result (or an app icon anywhere) will produce the application page of the selected application.

Before tapping 'Install' check that the publisher is correct. Otherwise, you might get an application which is not authentic. In the worst case, it can be some kind of exploitation attempt.

 

 

It is possible to install earlier versions of the apps by finding one at "Other versions".
slide_content_5:
The primary way of uninstalling apps on Sailfish devices is to open the app grid and long-tap it until the app icons get the delete buttons (X) on them. The actual deletion takes place by tapping the X buttons of those apps you want to uninstall.

You can also uninstall applications installed from Aptoide by using Aptoide Store. Uninstalling this way ensures that Aptoide is able to keep up to date with which applications you have installed.

You can uninstall an application by going to the “Apps” page (toolbar), which shows all Android applications installed on your device.
slide_content_6: Aptoide Store notifies you when there are updates available to your applications. To download the updates, go to the "Apps" tab at the toolbar, and tap "Update all" or tap just the individual apps you need to update.
slide_content_7:
Well, now let’s have a look at features or advantages of Aptoide that can even beat Google Play Store-

  • Aptoide is one such app where you will get all the apps for free hence without spending single penny you can enjoy all latest apps and games. Even the updates available for various apps come earlier for Aptoide as compared for that on Play Store.
  • Using Aptoide Apk Download you can also choose to generate organic downloads and can also run paid acquisition campaigns. These campaigns will come in the form of Cost per Install and will appear as Display Ads.
  • On other hand you can also target specific the countries by maximizing the relevance of your shown ads so that the click through rates will increase. Google play store where has limited presence, Aptoide client is translated over about 40 languages that makes t to reach the majority of users.
  • You can also create your own private store if you are using BETA version as than you can choose to share your apps with only private users of yours. Aptoide also comes with unique feature like “Trusted Stamps” which ensures that the app is Malware free with several layers of protection. It even lets you know of apps that contain malicious content.
  • It offers you large selection of apps not available at Android as well you can create your own app and upload it using the Drop box option of Aptoide which automatically gets synced to store. It offers publisher program so that anyone can manage their own personal Android stores.
slide_content_8:
From the reels of positive Aptoide TV reviews, it’s easy to see why this app store is one of the most popular 3rd party app stores.

 

And there are many reasons why.

 

For starters, Aptoide TV offers a vast catalog of apps and games that you can download at the click of a button. This open-source store allows developers to upload their apps for free so that you have a variety of apps to choose from. Aptoide also checks most of these apps to ensure they are safe to use. The apps that have been cleared as safe are marked with a green shield making it easier for you to choose virus-free apps for your device.

 

Further, Aptoide TV is designed with your TV in mind as it’s made specifically for Android TV. For instance, it has fonts that are big enough for your screen. It also has apps that are specifically meant to be downloaded on your Android TV, which is also compatible with your TV’s remote control.

 

Besides, Aptoide TV lets you know the peripherals that you’ll need to operate the apps or games that you intend to install on your device. This makes it easy for you to know if the software you want to download is adaptable to your TV or you’ll need to purchase additional devices such as a mouse or a game controller.
slide_title_9: 9. How to install Aptoide TV on your Android TV
slide_content_9:
Aptoide TV is a third-party app store that is an alternative to the google play store. This means if you want to install it on your device, you won’t find it on the Google play store.

 

So, how do you install Aptoide TV on your Android TV box?

 

And this is where our timely advice comes in. Here, we give you three methods you can use to install an Aptoide TV to your device, ensuring you enjoy its great features from the comfort of your couch.

 

1. Use your Android TV’s web browser

 

Before you download Aptoide TV on your TV’s web browser, ensure you have enabled the installation of third-party apps on your Android TV box.

 

If you haven’t done so already, go to settings and click on Enable installation of apps from unknown sources.

 

Now on to how to download Aptoide TV from your device browser:

 

  • Open your web browser

    •  

  • Key in https://m.aptoide.com/installer-aptoide-tv, this will take you to Aptoide TV’s homepage that looks like the image below

    •  

  • Click on the icon that says Download Aptoide TV

    •  

  • The download will start automatically provided you have a stable internet connection

    •  

  • Once the download is complete, run the installed file from your file manager, and you’re good to go.

 

2. Using the Amazon Downloader App

 

The Amazon Downloader app makes it super easy to install any third-party apps on your Amazon Fire TV or Android TV.

 

If you haven’t downloaded it yet, here’s a quick guide on how to do it:

 

  • Go to the search tab on your browser and type Downloader App

    •  

  • Choose the first option on your search results, and you’ll be taken to the Downloader App homepage. Ensure it has a bright orange icon, as shown below.

    •  

  • Click on the white install arrow and select continue

    •  

  • Downloader will seek permission to access your device storage, click allow

    •  

  • The app will be downloaded and installed on your device

 

Remember to allow the installation of unknown apps on your settings before you use Downloader. Now that you have Amazon Downloader installed you can use it to install Aptoide TV.

 

Here are the steps on how to do it.

 

  • Open Amazon Downloader and type in https://m.aptoide.com/installer-aptoide-tv

    •  

  • This link will take you to the Aptoide TV homepage.

    •  

  • From here, you can download Aptoide TV by clicking on the Download Aptoide TV icon

    •  

  • Follow the steps as prompted and click on Install

    •  

  • Once the install process is complete, you can delete the APK file to save on your device storage space

 

Use USB to install Aptoide TV

 

You can also copy an already downloaded Aptoide TV file on your TV device with the help of a USB Flash Drive.

 

Here is a step-by-step guide on how to do it if you prefer to use this method.

 

  • On your computer's browser go to https://m.aptoide.com/installer-aptoide-tv

    •  

  • Download the installer by clicking on Install Aptoide TV

    •  

  • Copy the downloaded file on your flash drive

    •  

  • Insert the flash drive on your TV box

    •  

  • Run the file on your file manager
slide_content_10:
In closing, Aptoide TV is an awesome third-party app store. It’s free to use, easy to install, and has numerous apps that will work on your favorite TV.

 

And now that you know how to install it on your Android TV, don’t you think it’s time you enjoyed everything this Google store alternative has to offer?
